title: Episode 211 “Quarantine Champs Ep.2” w/ Fat Joe, Lenny S, Jadakiss & Styles P
itunes:title: Episode 211 “Quarantine Champs Ep.2” w/ Fat Joe, Lenny S, Jadakiss & Styles P
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. The Quarantine Champs are back! In this episode we are joined by Fat Joe, Lenny S, Jadakiss and Styles P! The Champs along with Joe and Lenny S debate Eminem & JAY Z’s “Renegade” record and discuss Em’s impact on Hip-Hop and the world.

Lenny S shares his journey in Hip-Hop, working closely with Hov and witnessing his evolution first hand. The guys discuss the possibility of DJ Khaled FINALLY appearing on Drink Champs.

Jadakiss joins the conversation and shares with us insight about his new album “IGNATIUS” which is dedicated to his close friend Ignatius “Icepick Jay” Jackson.

Styles P joins the social distancing party and goes into detail about juicing. Sharing how a plant based diet and juicing has improved his health. As Styles P gets tech support from EFN. Styles also gives Sunny D BET health tips.

Styles P & Jadakiss also announce the upcoming LOX album and documentary!

Follow:
